doc:
Whitman Mayo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Whitman_Mayo 0 Whitman Blount Mayo (November 15, 1930 – May 22, 2001) was an American actor, best known for his role as Grady Wilson on the 1970s television sitcom Sanford and Son. Whitman_Blount_Mayo ( November_15_,_1930 – May_22_,_2001 ) was an_American_actor , best_known for his_role as Grady_Wilson on the_1970s_television_sitcom_Sanford_and_Son .
